participant_1.background:
I was once mistaken for a celebrity because of my hair.
my mom died when i was six.
my favorite color is red orange.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
i eat a lot of fish.

participant_2.background:
I like my food with a side of magic.
I'm doing well in school, thanks for asking!
I remember writing stories with my sister when we were kids.
i am disabled and cannot walk.
I ride my bike to class, and I visit animal shelters to give the animals some love.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hi! I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
I am doing well too, thanks for asking! What did you do today?
I went to school and then I rode my bike to the animal shelter to give the animals some love. I like to do that because it makes me feel good.
That's so nice of you! I love animals too. My mom died when I was six and I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
Oh no, I am so sorry to hear about your mom. I am sure she is watching over you and is so proud of the person you have become.
Thank you. I love that. My favorite color is red orange. What is your favorite color?
My favorite color is purple. I love how it is so calming and relaxing.
That's a great color. I like how it can be so vibrant and energetic as well.
Yes, it is a very versatile color.
I have a lot of creative hobbies. I like to paint and write stories.
That's so cool! I love writing stories too. I used to write stories with my sister when we were kids.
That's awesome! I wish I had a sibling to write stories with.
It was a lot of fun. We would come up with the craziest stories.
I bet you did. I love hearing about people's childhood memories.
